title: Berlin: City Sightseeing Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour
languages: Spanish, English, French, German, Italian, Hebrew, Japanese, Chinese, Polish, Portuguese, Arabic, Turkish, Russian
meeting_point:
Download the 'City Sightseeing Berlin' app to check the latest times and see a list of the stop locations.
The tour can be started from any of the bus stops along the route

title: Berlin: 1-Hour City Tour by Boat with Guaranteed Seating
languages: English, French, Hebrew, Italian, Polish, Russian, Swedish, Dutch, German, Finnish, Portuguese, Chinese
meeting_point: The meeting point is on the corner of Friedrichstraße and Am Weidendamm, a 5-minute walk from Friedrichstraße S- and U-bahn station. Please wait at the Stern und Kreisschiffahrt sign.

title: Berlin: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Tour in English
meeting_point: Meet your guide outside the Friedrichstraße train station on the square beside the '"Traenenpalast" (Palace of Tears) to begin the tour. Look for the guides holding the yellow umbrellas.

title: Berlin: Highest Swing in Europe
meeting_point: Please enter the lift and follow the signs to "High Swing".

title: Icebar Entrance with Complimentary Drinks
meeting_point: Meet at the ice bar 10 minutes before your reserved time slot. This Berlin Ice bar is at Spandauer Straße 2, next to Alexanderplatz

title: Berlin: TV Tower Standard Entrance Ticket
meeting_point: Please make your way directly to the security control point on the first floor of the TV Tower. The steps leading up to the entrance are located on the tower's northern side, directly opposite the Alexanderplatz S-Bahn (rail) station.

title: Berlin: Third Reich & Cold War 2 hour Guided Walking Tour
meeting_point: Meet in front of the tourist information point at Brandenburg Gate, Pariser Platz 1. Look for a guide with the pink umbrella at the Brandenburg Gate. The closest public transportation is the S-Bahn and U-Bahn station Brandenburger Tor (S1, S2, S25, S26 and U5) or buses 100 and 245.

title: Interactive DeJa Vu Museum Entrance Ticket
meeting_point: The entrance to the museum is right by Alexanderplatz, roughly 300-meters from Fernsehturm.

title: Reichstag, Dome and Government District Guided Tour
meeting_point: Meet at the intersection of Paul-Löbe-Allee and Konrad-Adenauer-Straße, next to the subway exit Bundestag (U5) exit D in front of the elevator.

title: Berlin: Subway/U-Bahn Photoshoot with a Local Photographer
meeting_point: Open in Google Maps

title: Berlin: Pub Crawl with Shots and VIP Club Entry
meeting_point: Meet your guide at 21:00 at Generator Berlin Alexanderplatz, Otto-Braun-Straße 65, 10178 Berlin

title: Berlin: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial Tour
meeting_point: Your guide will be waiting next to the World Time Clock at Alexandreplatz. They will be wearing their Buendía accreditation.

title: Berlin: Big Bus Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Tour & Currywurst
languages: Chinese, Danish, Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Turkish, Swedish
meeting_point:
You can activate your ticket in one of two ways:
1. Download the Big Bus app and use your Activity Provider Reference Number on this voucher to add your booking and activate your ticket when you are ready to travel. You can then board the bus at any Big Bus stop on the route.
2. Present your printed or mobile voucher with a Big Bus team member at any stop on the route during operating hours. A recommended boarding point is Big Bus Stop 1 located at Alexanderstraße 3-5, 10178 Berlin (Opposite Park Inn Hotel). Both the red and blue routes depart from this stop.
Your ticket includes a free currywurst and a free souvenir bag. Simply show your booking to a Big Bus staff member at any stop to receive a printed vouchers, which you can then use to collect both your currywurst and your souvenir bag.

title: Berlin WelcomeCard: Discounts & Transport Berlin Zones (ABC)
meeting_point:
After booking your WelcomeCard, you will receive an email with your ticket for public transportation across the entire city and a guide.

To receive discounts at the sights included in the card, present your ticket and guide directly at the attraction.

Please arrive within your selected time slot/date.

title: Berlin: 75-minute Trabi Safari
meeting_point: TrabiWorld, Zimmerstraße 97-100, at the corner of Wilhelmstraße.

title: Berlin: Hop-on Hop-off Bus Tour with Live Commentary
meeting_point:
You can start your tour from any of the stops on the route:
01 - Kurfürstendamm 231 (in front of Galeria); 02 - KaDeWe main entrance; 03 - Lützowplatz (an der Bushaltestelle); 04 – Philharmonic (an der Bushaltestelle); 05 - Potsdamer Platz (at Kolhoff Tower); 06 - Potsdamer Platz / Linkstraße; 07 - Topography of Terror; 08 - Checkpoint Charlie Wall Museum; 09 - Gendarmenmarkt, Markgrafenstr.; 10 - Alexanderplatz, TV Tower, Spandauer Str., between Red City Hall & Neptunbrunnen ; 11 - Karl-Liebknecht Str. 5 (to the boat); 12 – Museumsinsel / Humboldtforum; 13 - Unter den Linden 10 . Bud Spencer Museum; 14 - Unter den Linden 36 / Friedrichstraße; 15 - Unter den Linden 74, Madame Tussauds Berlin; 16 - Brandenburg Gate, Ebertstraße; 17 - Reichstag, Scheidemannstr; 18 - Hauptbahnhof, exit Washington Place; 19 - Haus der Kulturen der Welt (out of order); 20 - Bellevue Palace; 21 - Bikini Haus, Budapester Straße; 22 - U&S-Bahn station Zoologischer Garten.

title: Berlin: 1-hr Boat Tour with Bilingual Live Guide (DE/EN)
meeting_point: Please look for the Pier of our company "Reederei Hadynski". The ship is waiting on the river directly next to the restaurant "Alois Moser Alpenküche". It´s close to the S-Bahn Station "Hackescher Markt". The ship always arrives about 25-minutes prior to departure. Please present your voucher to the staff before going down the stairs to the ship. Check-in ends 5 minuts prior to departure. You will be guaranteed a seat, but maybe not together if you arrive late. If you arrive more than 30 minutes prior to departure there might be still a ship from a different company. After they depart one of our ships "Carola" or "Franziska" will arrive. Unfortunately the ship won´t be able to wait for guests that are running late. Please find out how to get to the ship before the tour starts. If you want to take the tour with live moderation please stick to the time you booked and don´t take an earlier tour as that might be with an audio guide. Please ask!

title: Quatsch Comedy Club Berlin: Die Live Show Entry Ticket
meeting_point:
You must exchange your voucher at the ticket counter before the show begins.
You may arrive 1 hour before the start of the show. Please leave yourself time to exchange the voucher.

title: Neues Museum Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Visitors' entrance of the James Simon Gallery, Bodestrasse, 10178 Berlin

title: Charlottenburg Palace Entry Ticket
meeting_point:
Please go to the entrance of Charlottenburg Palace at the time indicated on your ticket. For all other palaces included, you can visit during the day of your booking.
To visit the New Pavilion please go to Charlottenburg Palace New Wing or Old Palace to get a ticket with an entrance time.

title: Berlin: Government District Tour and Reichstag Dome Visit
meeting_point:
Meeting point: In front of the Bundestag subway station, Exit B: Otto-von-Bismarck-Allee

Google Maps:
https://maps.app.goo.gl/H8pnuB7H3FfJ2xSa7

Info: Subway line U5 (Bundestag stop). The guide will be holding a "TOUR" sign. He will be waiting in front of Exit B (not inside the station).

Note: We do not meet in front of the Reichstag building. We will reach the Reichstag entrance approximately 45 minutes after the tour through the government district. Please come to the meeting point.

meeting_point: Meet at Шар Welt (world map/globe) near Checkpoint Charlie.
